text: Ne yitsulila olwa Musa yaboola mbu; â€œEnywe Abandu banje- toto enywe mwikholele obubii khulwa okhukhola eshimosi (okhuba Nyasaye wenyu) Kho musabe eshileshelo khumwami wenyu, ne mwikalile emioyo chienyu (khulwokhwira ababii balimo), obo nobulayi khwinywe khu mulonji wenyu, mana nabaleshela, toto niye Omulesheli Owetsimbabaasi
